name: Gamester09's Games
description:
These are games that I designed while I am at Neumont, these are more like tech demos then games, but they are fun to play.  I do know that the games are buggy and don't always work the way intended but I do hope that you will enjoy them as they come out. Most bugs / issues that are in projects will likely not be fixed or worked on, but I would like it if you would put any issues, you have down in the comments.  Also new games / projects will be added in the future. And one last thing thank you to those that I got assets from, all the assets that I use either I created or were free for me to use so thank you for your time in making these assets

Currently Added:

Invaders from Space: A 3d space invaders game where the camera is positioned right behind your spacecraft.  Shoot down the enemies and don't let them hit you.

Space Hockey 3D: A 3D physics game where you play air hockey in space against an AI opponent that really isn't that smart.

Nim: Group Project that we created the game of Nim

Pente: Group Project that we created the game of Pente

Casino: Group Project that we created that has multiple different casino games mixed in

Middara: This is a Middara Tracker for stats and also a dice roller, this was the first time of me using WPF and it isn't good nor a game. I honestly just love this board game and hate keeping track of stats in said game

Once again thank you for looking into the games / projects that I have made, and I hope that you will stick around for other things that I am working on
